title: License review and LICENSE file
description:
Ensure proper licensing for open source release.

**Tasks:**
- Choose appropriate license (MIT, Apache 2.0, etc.)
- Add LICENSE file to root
- Add license headers to source files (optional)
- Review dependencies for license compatibility
- Document any third-party licenses

implementationPlan.description: Review dependencies for license compatibility in package.json files. All docs must work for Windows, Mac, and Linux users.
Create LICENSE file with MIT license. Follow GitHub community standards.
Add license field to all package.json files. Semantic versioning for all packages. Scripts must have cross-platform alternatives.
Add license badge to README.md and create THIRD_PARTY_NOTICES.md if needed.
